00090     //This method is used to make sure the distance does not exceed the reset distance
00091     static int CheckResetDistance(void *self, const PyAttributeDef*)
00092     {
00093         KX_NearSensor* sensor = reinterpret_cast<KX_NearSensor*>(self);
00094 
00095         if (sensor->m_Margin > sensor->m_ResetMargin)
00096             sensor->m_ResetMargin = sensor->m_Margin;
00097 
00098         sensor->SetPhysCtrlRadius();
00099             
00100         return 0;
00101     }
00102 
00103 #endif // WITH_PYTHON
